Row.Text: In addition to its [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture effects, the Eiffel Tower also provides +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to its [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture effects, the Eiffel Tower also provides +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to its [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture effects, the Eiffel Tower also provides +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to its [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture effects, the Eiffel Tower also provides +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works.

The Eiffel Tower provides a large amount of happiness, as well as +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism, and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works. This wonder is very helpful for those seeking a Culture victory.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Eiffel Tower provides a large amount of happiness, as well as +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism, and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works. This wonder is very helpful for those seeking a Culture victory.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]The Eiffel Tower provides a large amount of happiness, as well as +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism, and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works. This wonder is very helpful for those seeking a Culture victory.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Eiffel Tower provides a large amount of happiness, as well as +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism, and +50% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Great Works. This wonder is very helpful for those seeking a Culture victory.
